de: Shortly before the upcoming festival, a year after the end of episode 12, Daigo decides to find a girlfriend to dance with in the festival. Will he be able to do so?
nm: Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi: Kakaru ka? Gakuensai ni Koi no Hashi
jp: Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi: Kakaru ka? Gakuensai ni Koi no Hashi
